snippet: The chairman of the United Nations Committee Against Torture said legal proceedings had begun against two groups because of reports they sent to the panel.
abstract: United Nations Committee Against Torture criticizes Russia for prosecuting human rights groups ADC Memorial and Public Verdict Foundation because of reports they submitted to the committee for its review of the country's compliance with international treaty against torture or any other inhuman treatment.
lead_paragraph: The chairman of the United Nations Committee Against Torture said legal proceedings had begun against two groups because of reports they sent to the panel.

headline.seo: U.N. Panel Criticizes Russia for Prosecuting Rights Groups

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
